The claim originated from a video posted: showing demonstrators hoisting a large cross into the sky.
The video gained significant traction on: with over 150,000 views, and was shared by other Facebook users as well.
The claim lacked clarity regarding which: capitol building" it referred to, leading some to assume it was the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C.
Expert analysis and evidence: including photographs and videos, confirmed that the cross was actually erected at the Michigan Capitol in Lansing during a pro-Trump protest on January 6, 2021.
